mapper.select: SELECT H.HOBONG_LEVEL as HOBONG_LEVEL ,P.BASE_SALARY as BASE_SALARY ,P.POSITION_ALLOWANCE AS POSITION_ALLOWANCE ,P.LONGEVITY_BONUS AS LONGEVITY_BONUS ,P.TOTAL_HOBONG AS TOTAL_HOBONG FROM HOBONG H, POSITION_HOBONG P WHERE H.HOBONG_CODE = P.HOBONG_CODE AND p.POSITION_CODE = #{positionCode} ORDER BY LENGTH(H.HOBONG_LEVEL)
